column4: hi everyone! i have a big problem with a wireless lan. I have a ipw2200bg (supported by ubuntu) and an Access Point (also modem router wireless dsl). Why i can't connect to the AP? the card is enabled and there's no wpa or password.
have you tried iwconfig ethX essid "essid_here"; iwconfig ethX channel #
yes
the ssid is the same on AP and Laptop
use the pastebin to show me what says: iwconfig ethX
i wrote you the result in pvt
iwconfig ethX ap XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX  (the mac address of the AP)
i can't send privmsgs
you have to register with "/nickserv register yourpasswordhere"
i know that :)
so you don't want to register.. :D
i've found the AP BSSID. is that, right?
no, bssid is something else :)
try logging in the AP, the mac address should be there
AP BSSID: 00:04:ED:26:1F:CB
this is a nice way to call a mac address :)
ok, try it
it doesn't work
then check your antenna or something :)
the AP under windows works perfectly
i'm out of ideas
everybody's out of ideas... i'm desperate
